name: Grand Grand Grand Grand Grand Grandson's Experiment
name_original: Grand Grand Grand Grand Grand Grandson's Experiment
description:
You're in a experiment. You have to pass levels using our founder's grand grand grand grand grand grandfather's law: Newton's law of universal gravitation.  

LMB to create free body.

Use Red Button (in game world) by pressing LMB to start simulation.

ESC to Pause Menu (Restart,Menu,Quit)
